member.name: T:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.CspHeader.CspDirectivesBuilder
member.summary: CSP Directives Builder

member.name: P:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.CspHeader.CspDirectivesBuilder.DefaultSrc
member.summary: The HTTP Content-Security-Policy (CSP) default-src directive serves as a fallback for the other CSP fetch directives.

member.name: P:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.CspHeader.CspDirectivesBuilder.ScriptSrc
member.summary: The HTTP Content-Security-Policy (CSP) script-src directive specifies valid sources for JavaScript.

member.name: P:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.CspHeader.CspDirectivesBuilder.ScriptSrcElem
member.summary: The HTTP Content-Security-Policy (CSP) script-src-elem directive specifies valid sources for JavaScript {script} elements.

member.name: P:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.CspHeader.CspDirectivesBuilder.ScriptSrcAttr
member.summary: The HTTP Content-Security-Policy (CSP) script-src-attr directive specifies valid sources for JavaScript inline event handlers.

member.name: P:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.CspHeader.CspDirectivesBuilder.StyleSrc
member.summary: The HTTP Content-Security-Policy (CSP) style-src directive specifies valid sources for stylesheets.

member.name: P:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.CspHeader.CspDirectivesBuilder.StyleSrcElem
member.summary: The HTTP Content-Security-Policy (CSP) style-src-elem directive specifies valid sources for stylesheet {style} elements and {link} elements with rel="stylesheet".

member.name: P:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.CspHeader.CspDirectivesBuilder.StyleSrcAttr
member.summary: The HTTP Content-Security-Policy (CSP) style-src-attr directive specifies valid sources for inline styles applied to individual DOM elements.

member.name: P:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.CspHeader.CspDirectivesBuilder.ImgSrc
member.summary: The HTTP Content-Security-Policy img-src directive specifies valid sources of images and favicons.

member.name: P:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.CspHeader.CspDirectivesBuilder.FontSrc
member.summary: The HTTP Content-Security-Policy (CSP) font-src directive specifies valid sources for fonts loaded using @font-face.

member.name: P:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.CspHeader.CspDirectivesBuilder.MediaSrc
member.summary: The HTTP Content-Security-Policy (CSP) media-src directive specifies valid sources for loading media using the {audio} and {video} elements.

member.name: P:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.CspHeader.CspDirectivesBuilder.ObjectSrc
member.summary: The HTTP Content-Security-Policy object-src directive specifies valid sources for the {object}, {embed}, and {applet} elements.

member.name: P:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.CspHeader.CspDirectivesBuilder.ConnectSrc
member.summary: The HTTP Content-Security-Policy (CSP) connect-src directive restricts the URLs which can be loaded using script interfaces.

member.name: P:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.CspHeader.CspDirectivesBuilder.FrameAncestors
member.summary: The HTTP Content-Security-Policy (CSP) frame-ancestors directive specifies valid parents that may embed a page using {frame}, {iframe}, {object}, {embed}, or {applet}.

member.name: P:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.CspHeader.CspDirectivesBuilder.FrameSrc
member.summary: The HTTP Content-Security-Policy (CSP) frame-src directive specifies valid sources for nested browsing contexts loading using elements such as {frame} and {iframe}.

member.name: P:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.CspHeader.CspDirectivesBuilder.FormAction
member.summary: The HTTP Content-Security-Policy (CSP) form-action directive restricts the URLs which can be used as the target of form submissions from a given context.

member.name: P:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.CspHeader.CspDirectivesBuilder.BaseUri
member.summary: The HTTP Content-Security-Policy base-uri directive restricts the URLs which can be used in a document's {base} element.

member.name: P:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.CspHeader.CspDirectivesBuilder.ReportTo
member.summary: The Content-Security-Policy Report-To HTTP response header field instructs the user agent to store reporting endpoints for an origin.

member.name: P:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.CspHeader.CspDirectivesBuilder.WorkerSrc
member.summary: The HTTP Content-Security-Policy (CSP) worker-src directive specifies valid sources for Worker, SharedWorker, or ServiceWorker scripts.

member.name: P:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.CspHeader.CspDirectivesBuilder.ManifestSrc
member.summary: The HTTP Content-Security-Policy: manifest-src directive specifies which manifest can be applied to the resource.

member.name: P:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.CspHeader.CspDirectivesBuilder.PrefetchSrc
member.summary: The HTTP Content-Security-Policy (CSP) prefetch-src directive specifies valid resources that may be pre-fetched or pre-rendered.

member.name: P:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.CspHeader.CspDirectivesBuilder.UpgradeInsecureRequests
member.summary: The HTTP Content-Security-Policy (CSP) upgrade-insecure-requests directive instructs user agents to treat all of a site's insecure URLs (those served over HTTP) as though they have been replaced with secure URLs (those served over HTTPS).

member.name: P:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.CspHeader.ICspDirectives.FrameSrc
member.summary: Frames Src Directive
member.remarks: Defines valid sources for loading frames.In CSP Level 2 frame-src was deprecated in favor of the child-src directive. CSP Level 3, has undeprecated frame-src and it will continue to defer to child-src if not present.

member.name: P:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.CspHeader.ICspDirectives.FormAction
member.summary: Form Action Directive
member.remarks: CSP Level 2 - Defines valid sources that can be used as an HTML{form} action.

member.name: P:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.CspHeader.ICspDirectives.BaseUri
member.summary: Base Uri Directive
member.remarks: CSP Level 2 - Defines a set of allowed URLs which can be used in the src attribute of a HTML base tag.

member.name: P:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.CspHeader.ICspDirectives.ReportTo
member.summary: Report To Directive
member.remarks: CSP Level 3 - Defines a reporting group name defined by a Report-To HTTP response header. See the Reporting API for more info.

member.name: P:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.CspHeader.ICspDirectives.WorkerSrc
member.summary: Worker Src Directive
member.remarks: CSP Level 3 - Restricts the URLs which may be loaded as a Worker, SharedWorker or ServiceWorker.

member.name: P:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.CspHeader.ICspDirectives.ManifestSrc
member.summary: Manifest Src Directive
member.remarks: CSP Level 3 - Restricts the URLs that application manifests can be loaded.

member.name: P:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.CspHeader.ICspDirectives.PrefetchSrc
member.summary: Prefetch Src Directive
member.remarks: CSP Level 3 - Defines valid sources for request prefetch and prerendering, for example via the link tag with rel="prefetch" or rel="prerender":

member.name: P:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.CspHeader.ICspDirectives.UpgradeInsecureRequests
member.summary: Upgrade Insecure Requests Directive
member.remarks: The HTTP Upgrade-Insecure-Requests request header sends a signal to the server expressing the client's preference for an encrypted and authenticated response, and that it can successfully handle the upgrade-insecure-requests CSP directive.
